manifest.author: iamzainnnn
manifest.changelog:
- Enabled new fonts and effects.
- Changed timestamps position in feed posts.
- Redesigned account switcher.
- Enabled comment reshare feature.
- Enabled new self note menu.
- Enabled new explore grid peek ui.
- Enabled new animations.
- Enabled unlockable reels feature.
(Not functional yet)
- Enabled bio mention control.
- Enabled doodles in direct message.
(Not functional yet)
- Enabled new countdown stickers.
- Enabled notes haptics.
- Enabled new comments menu.
- Enabled reply with a reel option in comment context menu.(For public accounts)
- Enabled royalty free tab in audio browser.
- Enabled comments filtering.
- Enabled community chats.
- Enhanced prism designs.
- Enabled reels draft duplicate option.
- Enabled reels picture in picture.
- Enabled quiz add-on in publish screen.
- Enabled reshare to story in publish screen.
- Enabled multi select in archives
- Updated reels video editor tools.
- Updated some elements icon.
- Changed mute icon position in reels.
- Disabled ai suggestions in direct search bar.
- Disabled unnecessary flags.
- Fixed weird follow button ui in reels.
- Fixed some minor bugs.
